nodes.text: Ando Prime was an ice-covered planet located in the galaxy where the Ando Prime Centrum podracing course was located. Shortly before the outbreak of the Clone Wars, a race was broadcast live from on Ando Prime in the Outlander Club on the planet Coruscant. Following the Battle of Endor, the smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca visited Ando Prime and several other worlds in an attempt to gain intelligence on the Galactic Empire's attempts to shore up connections with criminal organizations it had previously supported. While on the worlds, Solo wore a disguise and asked around about Imperial activity, but failed to learn anything on Ando Prime.
